mapper.insert:
select qna_seq.nextval from dual
insert into qna values(#{num}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, qna_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select title, writer, contents, reg_date, hit, ref, step, depth from qna where num=#{num}

select * from (select rownum R, Q.* from (select * from qna where
title
writer
contents
like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by num desc) Q) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select count(num) from qna where
title
writer
contents
like '%'||#{search}||'%'
